action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ X ▢ X ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with X's forming a vertical line in the middle column and two additional X's in the top row and second row, creating a pattern resembling a cross with an extra X in the top-left and top-right corners.

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 square. In the first row, there are X symbols in the first and fifth positions, with empty squares in between. The second row has an X in the fourth position, with empty squares elsewhere. The third and fourth rows have an X in the third position, with empty squares elsewhere. The fifth row is entirely empty.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with X's forming a vertical line in the middle column and two additional X's in the top row and second row, creating a pattern resembling a cross with an extra X in the top-left and top-right corners.

QUESTION: Are there X's in the first and fifth positions of the first row in your grid?
